headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Pfister Comet Retro Custom
content: Dig out that Comet that’s been lurking at the back of your 10-car garage for years, and get ready for a Christmas miracle. Benny’s latest penchant is for turning Pfister’s Midlife Crisis mobile into an urban racer that looks like it just got done beating something small and fluffy to death with a chain. Try it if you dare.
